item.title: TV Ratings: Cable News Spikes With Coverage of Charlie Kirk Murder
item.description: Fox News, MSNBC and CNN all drew larger audiences than usual on Wednesday and Thursday.

item.title: CNN Taps Elex Michaelson to Anchor New Late Night News Show
item.description: Michaelson joins from the L.A. Fox station KTTV, where he drew widespread acclaim for his coverage of the wildfires earlier this year.

item.title: John Malone, Major Shareholder in CNN Parent Company, Reiterates Complaint Network Has ‘Embedded’ Liberal Bias: ‘Like How an Awful Lot of Us White Folks Say We’re Not Biased About Blacks’
item.description: John Malone has again voiced his displeasure about what he sees as CNN’s “embedded” left-leaning bias, likening the political views of the network’s staffers to latent racism t
